title: Replace coin image with new uploaded coin (transparent background)

requirements.text: Replace the current primary coin image (pointless-coin-new.dim_512x512.png) with the newly provided coin image (pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png) — a gold 3D coin with a white 'P' letter on it and a transparent background — across all components where the coin image appears, including HeroSection, Navigation (logo), AboutSection, CommunitySection CTA banner, and any other component currently rendering the coin image.

quotes: lets try it with this one actually dont include the white background

acceptanceCriteria: The new coin image (pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png) is saved to frontend/public/assets/generated/ with a transparent background (no white checkerboard or white fill behind the coin).
HeroSection renders the new coin image in place of the previous coin image.
Navigation logo renders the new coin image.
AboutSection renders the new coin image.
CommunitySection CTA banner renders the new coin image.
No component on the site still references the old coin image filenames for visible display.
The transparent background ensures the coin blends naturally against the dark site background.

constraints: The replacement coin image must have a transparent background — remove or strip any white background before use.
Do not alter any site copy, layout, links, or other components beyond swapping the coin image source.
nonGoals: Changing any text content, section copy, or tokenomics data.
Modifying layout structure or component order.
Updating any links or contract address values.

edits: Remove the white/checkered background and make it fully transparent, preserving the gold 3D coin with white 'P' letter (pointless-coin-new.dim_512x512.png > pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png)
